turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, I was wondering if you could help me make an order for Starbucks?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want a venti mocha latte with whole milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, which location would you like to pick up from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The Starbucks in West Village, Dallas, Texas, I have the address if you need it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: that's ok, i know which Starbucks you are talking about.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, i have ordered you a venti mocha latte with whole milk to be picked up at the Starbucks in west village in Dallas, is that correct?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, your drink will be ready in 5 minutes and your receipt will be texted to you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help with anything else?
